website_summaries.verdict: A high-concentration formula that delivers some of the greatest levels of Omega-3 available.
pros: Uses a minimum 90% triglyceride form, which creates concentrated Omega-3s
All ingredients are from naturally sourced fish
Helps to maintain eye health over time, especially after eye surgery or when suffering from dry eye
cons: A little pricey per gel capsule
Has a significant odor and taste that some people dislike

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade Fish Oils. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These are professional grade fish oils that my ND recommended. These have really helped with system inflammation I have from autoimmune issues. I've been on them for 3 months and won't go without. My order from Amazon came fast and the price was less than I can get at my doctors office. I highly recommend Nordic Fish Oils. No fishy taste and no burping. The pills are large to swallow but I don't have any problems with that. I am SUPER sensitive to most supplements so was pleased that these not only settled good they helped.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Better insulated shipping package needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I have high cholesterol and need to take an omega 3 supplement to help boost my HDLs. These capsules have a lemon taste rather then the fishy taste most omega 3 supplements have. 4 stars because when I ordered my last bottle in the June, the heat the bottle was exposed to during delievery made the capsules stick together in one huge clump, so I have to pry each capsule off the clump to take them. They are sturdy and have not had any of them break yet, but a better insulated shipping package needs to be used for this product for a least the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Most expensive fish oil on the market...
customer_reviews.text: I was a firm believer in Nordic Naturals for a long time but now after reading several new studies about fish oil and vitamin d supplementation it is proven that it has minimal positive effects on the body. Is it Mercury free and the purest form of fish oil you can buy on the market? It sure is. Will it actually help you with your cholesterol and overall health? According to new studies it will not. This fish oil is nothing more than snake oil. Do not bother wasting your money consuming any Omega 3 or fish oil products. Thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: David Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for daily overall well-being
customer_reviews.text: I started using this supplement regularly since January of this year prior and post op of my lasik eye surgery. They have been really beneficial not only for my eyes but overall health since I also have a rare neurological movement disorder called cervical dystonia aka spasmodic tortcollis which causes nerve damage from my head and neck muscles involuntary moving all day and I feel that these supplements help a bit with managing the pain much better since they haven’t found a cure for this disorder yet I’ve had to find ways to help my body feel better.
customer_reviews.author: COCO

customer_reviews.title: If there’s a better product on the market I’d like to see it....
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and I believe this product is not an exception. I’ve been taking different omega 3 products for years and I believe this is one of the best on the market. The ratio of EPA / DHA is perfect for my needs. After reading Nordics website faqs I’m also convinced that they’re making the extra effort to produce a high quality product. This makes the higher cost reasonable to me. As someone who has been to hell and back with health issues I can assure you no amount of money is worth being sick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fish oil
customer_reviews.text: After listening to a podcast with Dr, Rhonda Patrick, I was turned onto this fish oil. This is top quality and effectively dosed. I don’t notice the lemon flavor much, but can smell it in the bottle. No fishy burps at all.
customer_reviews.author: RyanH

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: My Eye Dr. recommended that I take Nordic Naturals ProOmega 2000-Fish Oil for my dry eye. I have been taking it for about a month and just ordered my second bottle. I cannot believe the change in my eyes. No tearing, no burning or irritation. Feels so good!!! I have seen review on how well this fish oil works on nails. I'm hoping to see some improvment soon. But I am very happy for what it is doing for my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lin C.

customer_reviews.title: No after taste!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these supplements for nearly a year - as recommended by my opthamologist after my lasik surgery. I will continue to take them as they are good for maintaining eye health.
customer_reviews.author: Joceline

customer_reviews.title: Great product and helps with Joint pain.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these about 2 months ago. I used to have joint issues in my shoulders and elbows. Once I started taking this, about 2 weeks in, my joint issues seem to have gone away. I have continued to take it, but so far this has been the only thing that helped my shoulders. Will continue to take this as long as my joint pain stays away.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pearre

customer_reviews.title: Blob of capsules from High Performance Supps
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered Nordic Naturals many times over the years. This complaint is really for the seller (which makes it difficult to rate the product properly). I don't know what happened; but when I received this bottle of soft gel capsules, they were stuck together in one big blob, literally. I threw them away because I was worried that if they had been stored in extreme heat conditions, they may have lost potency. Looking back, I guess I should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: phoebe bebe

customer_reviews.title: These were recommended by my Midwife for help with postpartum depression and ...
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by my Midwife for help with postpartum depression and as a reliable brand. My only complaint is my bottle arrived with one capsule that had opened in the bottle so all the other pills are horribly fishy because of the oil all over them. I try rinsing them before taking them but it does not help. They are too expensive to not use it up so it is awful taking it each morning with that smell and taste. Otherwise I can really tell a difference after taking it. They are effective. Overall I would recommend because I am sure this is a random happening. Hopefully not in my next bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis James

customer_reviews.title: It’s up to you to pay the extra money. I did.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell if these are better than any other fish oil. But the levels of EPA and DHA as well as independent reviews suggest it is. These pills have the omega 3 in triglyceride form instead of ester form, which helps with absorption. That’s what I read so far. All I know is I can never tell if a supplement works or not. (CBD... really? It’s just an anti epileptic and THC augmenter) My failing vertebral discs suggest I should take the best omega 3 I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Matney

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, and good idea
customer_reviews.text: We started using this dose of fish oil to avoid having to cram two capsules into our pill sorters for each day, and having to take as many supplement pills. We've been using the brand for a long, long time, as it was recommended by our doctor; but, also it is great because it doesn't have any fishy after taste. Very happy that we can actually save money by purchasing the larger quantity, then divide the bottle among us. We believe the quality and health benefits to be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Cmartcookie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Chiroprator for my arm/shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my Chiroprator for my arm/shoulder pain. It's helped reduce the inflamation and pain. I stopped taking it to see if I could tell a difference and I did and immediately continued to take them. They only draw back in the product is the price but I think they are worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pierce

customer_reviews.title: works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my functional medicine doctor for joint pain/inflammation. I take two every day and I can really tell the difference if I skip a day. They are pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes a huge difference to my eye health... blurry, cloudy vision from cataracts which were recently diagnosed. I highly recommend it. Love Nordic Naturals, always.
customer_reviews.author: Patti E.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend ProOmega 2000 - Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: I are very happy with ProOmega 2000. My functional medicine doctor told me to increase my Omega 3 to taking 3 a day for my inflammation. My husband also takes it for his heart. After researching the average EPA,DHA on other bottles of Omega, this product caught my eye because of the potency we would be receiving in just 2 pills. We are both very grateful it has a lemon flavor to subdue from the high potency taste of fish oil in it. I will definitely be ordering it again. It is a little pricey and hopefully the price will come down at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: No Fish Burps !!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommends an Omega-3 supplement to alleviate dry eye. This product *works*. If I don't take it for a few days, my dry eye becomes worse. Cheap Omega-3 supplements have a fishy taste. Even if you swallow the cheap capsules whole, you will suffer the nasty taste when you burp. Everyone in the room will suffer the fishy stench. Nordic Naturals makes Omega-3 supplements with a pleasant lemon after-taste. Nordic Naturals is worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: My Eye Doctor Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor recommended these for my dry eye. She says it helps give the eyes what it needs to help the dry eye.
customer_reviews.author: hardtimesdalhart

customer_reviews.title: One big ,fused glob
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad! I have used this product before as it's a brand recommended by my Functional Medicine doctor. I made a recent order and all of the gel capsules were stuck together in one big glob. I put submitted a return form and ordered a replacement bottle and it too is one big stuck-together mass of gels. I can't even pry them apart. I had to return the second bottle too. Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: JHollyB

customer_reviews.title: Gels were damaged, ruined the contents.
customer_reviews.text: This is second time this has happened. On July 29, 2020, I received a bottle of 120. They were all stuck together due to some gels having been broken inside. Nothing I tried worked on breaking them apart. Had to throw away entire bottle - a loss of $76.45. Yesterday, 9/22/2020, I received a bottle of 60. Again some gels inside had been broken open and all were coated with fish oil and sticking together. After putting in refrigerator and then freezer for a while, I was then able to save the rest of the bottle even tho many were coated with fish oil. A good product for treating my dry eye, but ordering online has not been satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Using for 2ys now
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I do know a difference in our mental performance when taking this and when we don't. This is one of the better brands for fish oils because of it's purity and reliability in quality standards. We did stop taking it for a while (1mo) because it's so dang expensive; but the benefits are well worth the money and now we take it everyday. I recommend you try it for three months, stop for a couple weeks, and then see if you notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Huge glob, twice
customer_reviews.text: Is this purples? Yes! Is it high quality? Seems to be, yes. However at this ridiculous price one would expect a bag of desiccant in it. Ordered once, received huge glob that seemed like one had leaked. They lovingly shipped me a replacement, only to have a huge glob again. I had to spend quite a bit of time gently pulling them apart as to not rip them. At $42 a month, spend 2 cents and put a desiccant bag in the bottle to avoid this!
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: ProOmega 2000
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bottles of the Omega's on my Eye Doctors recommendation. Both bottles had all the capsules stuck together. When I wrote to the company they said they had probably been incorrectly stored. They either got to hot or two cold. It's been very difficult to pull them apart and get them out of the container. I certainly don't want to puncture the capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia J. Queen

customer_reviews.title: They come all stuck together
customer_reviews.text: These are great fish oils and they work the best out of all I’ve tried for my Fibromyalgia pain. However, when ordering them from amazon, they have arrived both times in one large glob-all stuck together. The first time I carefully shook and pried then apart but on my 2nd time, there were several that were broken and leaking. Unfortunately idk if I’ll order them from here again because this is a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: candi

customer_reviews.title: One big lump of capsules
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is fine, the composition is what I was looking for, but there is a real problem with trying to get the capsules unstuck from one another in the bottle. It's one huge lump of gelatin capsules and I'm having to slam the bottle on the table repeatedly just to free up a few of them. They're expensive, I shouldn't have to expend this much effort to get a pill out of a bottle! Do they need to be refrigerated or something?
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle A. Costanza

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for eye health & treatment of dry eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the recommendation of my optometrist for dry eye syndrome. This particular formulation contains the high doses of EPA & DHA needed. It was also the most reasonable I could find. It is a large capsule but easier than most to shallow because it is so soft. There is also NO fishy taste. I am optimistic but it's too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: bajababe

customer_reviews.title: These fish oil capsules work great!
customer_reviews.text: These fish oil capsules are big and may be difficult for some to swallow. I haven’t had any problems swallowing them at all though. I was put on a blood thinner for the rest of my life and didn’t want to be on a pharmaceutical medication. These work as well or better with none of the side effects you have with regular medications plus no interactions between other medications for me!
customer_reviews.author: Trinkets35

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Omega3 fish oil softgels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with no fishy taste. I have used these for 7 years and love them. Really helps joint pain, high blood pressure, skin, and hopefully cancer protection and immune response and arterial function. This is from wild caught sardines and anchovies in cold North Atlantic near Norway and is tested for all the contaminants of concern with excellent reports so far. Hope this product is available forever.
customer_reviews.author: RHP

customer_reviews.title: Unusable product; gel caps were melted together. Amazon replaced with same defective product.
customer_reviews.text: The gel caps in the container were all melted together so I couldn't use the product!! Amazon sent me a "replacement" BUT THE SAME PROBLEM -- all melted together -- so still couldn't use. Just shaking the unopened bottle makes it obvious that all the gel caps have become one big blob!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but v good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are pricey but great. And they don’t give you that after fish taste at all that some fish oil capsules leav you with. Has helped with eye healt and immunity
customer_reviews.author: DC Reviewer 2011

customer_reviews.title: If you order from Amazon, they will be stuck together and difficult to remove from bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I started this product and purchased the original one not through Amazon. The second bottle was purchased through Amazon and after getting through the top layer, the capsules are completely stick together. This tells me that the Amazon distributor is not properly handling the product. They shouldn’t be stuck together.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Antoniou

customer_reviews.title: My Eye Dr. Recommended - It works!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my eyes clear up. Although they're expensive, they work. Although they're big to swallow down, they work. These are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Capsules get stuck together inside bottle, impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: The strength of the product dosage is what my MD asked me to take. However, repeatedly many of the capsules are stuck together in a lump inside the bottles and very difficult or impossible to separate, prompting me to make comment in this review. I do not know if this is a storage, shipping, heat exposure issue, and wonder if the product quality is compromised by the time I receive it. As expensive as this product is, I would like to be able to consume the entire bottle of product. If not for this problem with multiple purchases, my rating would be five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Fused into a messy ball
customer_reviews.text: Opened these up as soon as they arrived and they were in a tight ball. I had to cut the container bottom off and try to salvage as many as I could. Several of them leaked, spreading fish oil over the lot of them. I can't return them because they charge a restocking fee, even though their shoddy quality control is to blame. Very disgusted right now. These things are very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Matysiak

customer_reviews.title: Worst Nordic Naturals experience!
customer_reviews.text: Quality control is needed! I love the brand Nordic Naturals, this has been my worst experience with the brand. All the vitamins are leaking and are stuck together! I cannot take these vitamins because of the horrendous fishy smell and taste! These were very expensive, I expect a FULL REFUND!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: This batch was bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these for years. This bottle showed up with all the capsules stuck in a lump. Not sure they still have the potency
customer_reviews.author: Dburg

customer_reviews.title: Dry Eye
customer_reviews.text: If you have dry eye, this is an excellent product. I have been taking this product for 3 years. When I went to my Ophthalmologist, he did a test to measure the tears in my eyes... he could not get a measurement in my right eye (no tears) and my left eye was very low tear production. I was in so much pain, I gave myself a black eye by rubbing them. After a few months, the irritation was gone. I use eye drops when I get up in the morning, but for the rest of the day, I produce tears.
customer_reviews.author: Rosee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Nordic Naturals from two different vendors on Amazon (Vensur and Apples and Oranges) and both times the tablets are clumped together because a tablet or two has busted open. I called Nordic Naturals personally, and they said they are not authorized vendors. So make sure it says sold by: Nordic Naturals and fulfilled by Amazon to get the best quality. I’ve learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Healthy supplement to add to your daily intake
customer_reviews.text: This product does not leave a bad taste in your mouth nor does it give you fishy burps. The high omega content is very healthy for your eyes (among other things) and was recommended by my eye doctor for dry eyes. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: Capsules stick together in a huge clump
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle that had the same problem. The capsules clump into a big mass and when I tried to separate them some leaked. For the price I think the quality control is substandard. There should probably be a moisture control packet. I had to literally cut the plastic bottle in order to get the capsules out. The product is good and doesn't upset my stomach like a lot of EPA/DHA products do, but I won't be ordering again if the replacement product is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Naturals is the best
customer_reviews.text: This company is highly reputable. It tests its products to meet their high quality standards. I've been using this brand for years and recommend them over those that advertise on television.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Madison WI

customer_reviews.title: Fish Oil Capsules Melted
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these fish oil capsules in the past and never had a problem. This time they were all stuck together, like they've been in a hot area, and started to melt. I finally got them out of the bottle and the inside of the bottle was coated with yellow from melting. Return them as no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bacall

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, me thinks.
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by my naturopath for helping rid my body of inflammation. I had used the "regular" Nordic Naturals Omega-3 Fish Oil but didn't notice a difference. With the ProOmega 2000, I have noticed some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Highest dose of EPA and DHA
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality product. I take two tablets a day. My total cholesterol dropped 40 points.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Samourjian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Not sure this product is authentic
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for about 3 years and this doesn't seem like a NN authentic product. The softgels are stuck together in one huge lump, which I have never seen before. I could barely get even one pill out of the lump--I broke 3 just trying to get them apart. Then I decided it's not worth the risk to take these dubious pills--who knows what's in them, where they came from, or if they're safe. A lot of money for an unusable product. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: LLCoolJ

customer_reviews.title: May have to cut the bottle apart to get them out.
customer_reviews.text: Good product if you can get them apart and out of the bottle. The stick to each other and are hard to get apart and out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: James M Landry

customer_reviews.title: No fish burps!
customer_reviews.text: These omegas are fantastic! They are the usual size but the best thing about them is that there is absolutely no fish burps! There’s a photo of a lemon on the packaging, however there isn’t really any lemon flavor, but that’s not really s problem.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recomended Pro Omega 2000
customer_reviews.text: i like that the capsules are easy to swallow, and they have a lemon taste instead of a fishy taste.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Capsules Stuck together
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these from amazon for many months now. This order arrived with all the capsules stuck together unfortunately. I can separate some of them but most are stuck together pretty well. Disappointed in this shipment.
customer_reviews.author: N. A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these vitamins for the second time but they came all stuck together. Could not get them out of the bottle. Had to cut bottle open to access.
customer_reviews.author: gd

customer_reviews.title: Best fish oil
customer_reviews.text: Best fish oil there is. High quality, high amount of fish oil. No fishy taste either. Recommended to me by my naturopathic dr.
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: All pills are stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: All pills are stuck together. Replaced but still the same. I have to return it again.
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Eye doctor noticed an improvement in my dry eyes at my last visit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All pills came stuck together unable to get any out of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this product and have had no issues except the last order all pills are stuck together and I can’t get any out of the bottle. I’m so disappointed as I spent so much money on something I can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great and trusted product
customer_reviews.text: The beat high potency omega fish oil out there. Works great for bringing cholesterol levels down. Eat better, have vitamins and get some exercise. These help
customer_reviews.author: Nancy415

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market and lemon flavored
customer_reviews.text: The best product on the market, and the most healthy. It was recommended by my doc. Helps with cholesterol and any sort of cramping. Will continue to order regardless of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: No fishy burps great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love this omega 3 because it has more dha than others. My Dr. told me to up my omega 3 for inflammation & heart. Nordic Natural works better for me than one I was taking.
customer_reviews.author: nancy snider

customer_reviews.title: No more dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist prescribed along with eye drops because of dry eye issue. No longer using drops and just taking Nordic Naturals and dry eye problem is no longer an issue.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive eye vitamin
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor recommended these. Cheaper here than through her.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was on heavy duty pain killers after back surgery. After taking this (2x/day) for 24 hrs the swelling reduced to where I could get relief with tylonal. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: ZenCats

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these for my dry eyes. It worked well for that and has also been linked to lower cholesterol. Unlike similar products, the taste isn't horrible and I haven't experienced any "fish burps" associated with these types of supplements. I recommend keeping these in the fridge or freezer to avoid the product from clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...these ProOmega supplement gels came in rock solid/glued together and each morning I need to break each gel tablet apart with a utensil. Yes, they are stored in a cool dry place as are my other supplements. These gels came in stuck together and have stayed that way.
customer_reviews.author: SD Olie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My physician and my optometrist recommended this product for joint health and also dry eye health! It's actually great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my doctor.
customer_reviews.text: Capsules are convenient, not hard to swallow, but large. This product was recommended by my doctor to help with tremors in my hands. It is helping.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sill unsure
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this product for awhile now. This particular brand recommended by my doctor. Not sure i see all of the benefits yet, and it is pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Suggested by my Opthamologist
customer_reviews.text: My Opthamologist recommended this brand specifically, saying it has better absorption than other brands. Honestly, they taste pretty good too, I usually chew them.
customer_reviews.author: zana

customer_reviews.title: leaking capsules
customer_reviews.text: We have been purchasing this brand for several years now. Our last bottle the capsules were leaking and sticking together. Now at the end of the bottle we are seeing capsules with air bubbles, so they must of been leaking all this month.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Lovetro

customer_reviews.title: Great for women
customer_reviews.text: I order this every month for my mom because she deals with high anxiety. It is been really good to us my mom is more relaxed and calmer than before.
customer_reviews.author: Grace90

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist recommended I take this product for dry eye symptoms. I believe it is helping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omega III
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist suggested this brand. got a few at the office, but the Amazon price is much more reasonable. Does not have after taste. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RNretired

customer_reviews.title: ProPhets 2000
customer_reviews.text: These are the same caps that I got from my eye doc, although slightly less expensive. From first opening the bottle, the caps were stuck together. I finally had to cut the sides of the bottle in a couple places in order to get all of the caps out. Won't be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be helping
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor put me on these. They seem to be helping with my dry eyes. No bad taste. I'd give another star if they weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Simons/Sutor

customer_reviews.title: Product fuzed into a single mass
customer_reviews.text: Received item and the entire contents were fuzed into a single mass. Must have been exposed to excessive heat in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: The product was good. I was not happy that it was sent ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was good. I was not happy that it was sent in an envelope that was stuffed into my tiny apartment mailbox instead if to my door. It got so hot in there that the capsules stuck together (which it says it is designed to withstand) yet one day, I was grabbing a pill that wouldn't come off the other and it ripped open, leaking oil all over the other pills so i had greasy pills the rest of the month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned.  Product was all stuck together
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, I couldn't get the product out. All of the gelatin capsules were stuck together. I even tried shaking the bottle really hard to see if I could dislodge a capsule. No luck. I don't know if the bottle was exposed to extremely high temperatures and the capsules melted or if something else happened. I returned the item and bought the item locally.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: For your health
customer_reviews.text: I take for my brain and the added omega 3. Keeps my HDL up. Love they are third party tested.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The fish oil doesn't have the fishy smell or taste as compare to other brand I have tried before. I have been taking this fish oil for almost 6 months, my joint pain has lessen. I am taking 4 capsules per day. I gave a 4 star instead 5 is because the second bottle I bought all the fish oil got stuck together. The quality is inconsistent but overall it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leung

customer_reviews.title: Good Fish Oil
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that it was delivered this time and they were frozen. I hope this will not effect the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristione

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipment
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand of fish oil for over 3 years and my eye doctor believes in this product
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Stuck Together
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a year, and find them very helpful with my eye dryness. I will buy this product again, but not from this seller. I purchased two bottles, and the soft gels were stuck together in a clump in both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested to me by an MD. It has helped and I feel better when taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Holiday Writes Jana

customer_reviews.title: very little taste from burps
customer_reviews.text: Taking this as recommended by dietician. Although expensive, seems better than cheaper products.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: These were much cheaper than from my eye doctors office
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor recommended these along with Restasis for my chronic dry eye.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: High quality, BUT, the capsules arrive in a huge glob and require one to cut open the bottle (not easy) and gently work the wad of pills until you can manipulate the fistful of gelatin capsules until you can pry them apart. The last bottle took an hour to separate
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kuenzi

customer_reviews.title: A great product. You will be pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I take it for lowering triglycerides and overall cholesterol. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Y.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda pricey
customer_reviews.text: I take these for cholesterol not for pain. Not sure why that’s a starred question. No burp fishy taste.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineV

customer_reviews.title: Dry eye supplement
customer_reviews.text: I used this as recommended by my optometrist. An added bonus is that I was able to go off of the statin drug I was on for high cholesterol. The drug made my body hurt which I attributed to age. I feel much better since I went off the statin.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Borum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!!! I had to start off with one pill and work up to two as required.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Relief
customer_reviews.text: I've taken these vitamins for years prescribed by my neurologist, they also help give me more energy
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Don't taste too bad
customer_reviews.text: Great fish oil capsules! I started taking these after my laser eye surgery and I feel they have helped immensely. Would recommend for anyone to take!
customer_reviews.author: Fairy Queen Caelia

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Rhonda Patrick used to take it, so definitely good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: ProOmega 2000
customer_reviews.text: ProOmega 2000 has exceeded my expectations by far. It has relieved my dry eyes as well as joint pain. I feel so much better. I didn't think there was anything I could do about getting older but this has really helped.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Love that these omegas don't leave an after taste or ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that these omegas don't leave an after taste or the dreaded burping afterwards. They are large, but go down easily. Recommended to a friend, who was very surprised and really likes them too.
customer_reviews.author: WackyRo

customer_reviews.title: Better products
customer_reviews.text: I’m little upset because I like the Nordic products but the last bottle I bought all the capsules were so sticky I had to put one by one in a towel paper and dry the bottle, if I don’t wrote before was because I was out of the country, hoping in the future when I order another one not will have the same problem. Thanks for you attention.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Petit

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but so very worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Omegas since the late 90s, I always come back to Nordic Naturals...and these have been the ‘best of the best’. My search may be over, for good!
customer_reviews.author: Leopards

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as 1 Giant Blob of Pills!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try these because they were suggested to me by my doctor. I received them today and they are all melted and attached together. I’ve requested another but need to ship them back which is kind of a pain in the rear. Hopefully I will be able to try them soon.
customer_reviews.author: april5916

customer_reviews.title: Great omegas!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the product was a bit smaller and that a dosage was only one capsule. Plus, the price is high.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Omegas!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these for a little over 30 days, so still waiting to see final results after taking for a few months. No fishy after taste or 'burb', which I experienced with some brands. So far the best I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: rshan

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: When I received the Proomega 2000 soft gels I took them for a while but then noticed they smell terrible and a bunch of them were stuck together. There is no way I can finish these. They are awful!
customer_reviews.author: BubblesPittsburgh

product_meta.title: Nordic Naturals ProOmega 2000, Lemon Flavor - 2150 mg Omega-3 - 120 Soft Gels - Ultra High-Potency Fish Oil - EPA & DHA - Promotes Brain, Eye, Heart, & Immune Health - Non-GMO - 60 Servings
feature_bullets: Why Omega-3s; Research shows that the essential fatty acids EPA & DHA in fish oil support heart, brain, eye, & immune health; Omega-3s may also help support a healthy mood

Doctor-Recommended Formula; Nordic Naturals ProOmega 2000 features our highest concentration omega-3 fish oil in soft gels; This formula meets the daily recommended dose suggested by the American Heart Association to support a healthy heart

Better Absorption, Better Taste, No Fishy Burps; All of our omega-3 fish oil concentrates are in the triglyceride molecular form (the form naturally found in fish) for optimal absorption; Great lemon taste

Purity Guaranteed; Every batch of Nordic Naturals fish oil is crafted from fresh, wild-caught, omega-rich fish; Nordic Naturals is committed to using only non-GMO ingredients; Gluten- & dairy-free; No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives

Ethical Innovation; Nordic Naturals has always been at the forefront of sustainable and ethical practices in the natural products industry; Through science and innovation, we are committed to delivering safe, effective nutrients for optimal wellness
